Description: Do you have a business or planning start a business but you dont know how to present it to your clients/customers and investors? Well here at Tipe Graphics we make sure you dont need to worry about the 'How' We can brand your business thourouly in a way to suite your desire.
About: Tipe Graphics are designers spcializing in Brand and Web design. We focus on helping small bussiness owners to brand their bussiness, idividuals and social media influencers with their potfolio.
